title: One of Vi's abilities should include punches that knock the enemy backward
body: She should have one ability where she gets 3 punches and they each knock the enemy back a little on hit.  This would make her look and feel so much more effectual.  I get that a change like this would mean she'd have to be rebalanced in other areas but I feel like a punch-centric champion should have an ability/passive like this.

replies.body:
you know what makes it feel like you're punching hard? dealing lots of damage

if vi had 3 more knock-ups in her kit then she should not be allowed to deal significant amounts of damage under any circumstances

Her Q is a punch that knocks them back, and her ult is a punch that knocks them up into the air and then back down.

I think she has you covered already.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BAyoEm6c,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-08T06:20:00.439+0000)
> I think she has you covered already.

None of those make her feel like she's knocking you into the pavement though.  Some 3 hit passive tacked onto her W passive or maybe onto her E stacks that add a knockback to each hit would look and feel awesome.  And maybe it would knock up the enemy if they're pinned against a wall.

Knocking back several times in quick succession would be OP, if they were going to do something like this on an unnecessary rework then maybe make the third hit on her W passive knock back, but they would have to take away from her power budget somewhere else and it would get all complicated.

Also, when I am playing as Vi I feel like I am knocking them into the pavement, and when I play against her I feel like I am getting knocked into the pavement.
doesn't have to make sense, there is a dude that have 3 shadows and he isn't anywhere near any of them.
